pages.text: Tuhade la'i rozi'am di'am ratam vica apani'am patani'am de kola jana ja'iza kita gi'a. Uha tuhade la'i libasa hana ate tusim unham la'i libasa ho. Alaha ne samajhi'a ki tusim apane apa nala dhokha kara rahe si, tam usa ne tuhade upara kirapa kiti ate tuhanu mu'afa kara dita. Tam huna tusim unham nu milo ate cahom jihara alaha ne tuhade la'i likha dita hai. Ate kha'o ate pi'o ate ithom taka ki savera di saphedadhari kalidhari nalom alaga sapasata ho jave phira rata patani'am nala sabhoga na karo. Iha alaha di'am bana'i'a ho'i'am hadam hana tusim inam de nere na ja'o. Isa tarham alaha apani'am nisani'am lokam la'i bi'ana karada hai tam ki uha bacana

Ate tusim apasa vica ika dusare de dhana nu naja'iza rupa nala na khamo ate na hi usa nu hakamam taka pahuca'u tam ki dusari'am da dhana da ko'i bhaga naja'iza (batarika-e-gunaha) kha ja'o, halanki tusi' isa nu janade ho

Uha tuhanu cana de ghatana ate vadhana de sabadha vica savala karade hana. Kahi devo ki uha haja la'i lokam vasate samam jam tarika (dasana) vale hana ate neki iha nahim ki tusim chata uparom gharam vica a'o balaki neki iha hai ki manukha sajami bane. Ate gharam vica daravazi'am vicom di a'u ate alaha tom daro tam ki tusim safala hovo
Ate alaha de maraga vica unham lokam nala laro jihare tuhade nala larade hana. Ate ati'acara na karo. Alaha zulama karana vali'am nu pasada nahim karada
